Name: ABS
Label: ABS
Description: Returns the absolute value of a number, a number without its sign

Name: ACOS
Label: ACOS
Description: Returns the arc cosine of the number in radians, if the given number is between -1 and 1.  Otherwise NULL.

Name: ADDMONTHS
Label: ADDMONTHS
Description: Add the num months to the date, using the last date of the month if date is the last day of the month or adding num months has fewer days.

Name: AGE
Label: AGE
Description: Calculates the Age

Name: AGEON
Label: AGEON
Description: Calculates the Age

Name: AND
Label: AND
Description: Checks whether all arguments are true and returns TRUE if all arguments are true

Name: ASCII
Label: ASCII
Description: Return the first character's code point from the given string as a number.

Name: ASIN
Label: ASIN
Description: Returns the arc sine of the number in radians, if the given number is between -1 and 1.  Otherwise NULL.

Name: ATAN
Label: ATAN
Description: Returns the arc tangent of the number in radians.

Name: ATAN2
Label: ATAN2
Description: Returns the arc tangent of the quotient of y and x in radians.

Name: BEGINS
Label: BEGINS
Description: Checks if text begins with specified characters and returns TRUE if it does. Otherwise returns FALSE

Name: BLANKVALUE
Label: BLANKVALUE
Description: Checks whether expression is blank and returns substitute_expression if it is blank. If expression is not blank, returns the original expression value.

Name: BR
Label: BR
Description: Inserts an HTML break tag in string formulas

Name: CASE
Label: CASE
Description: Checks an expression against a series of values.Â  If the expression compares equal to any value, the corresponding result is returned. If it is not equal to any of the values, the else-result is returned

Name: CASESAFEID
Label: CASESAFEID
Description: Converts a 15-character ID into a case insensitive 18-character ID

Name: CEILING
Label: CEILING
Description: Rounds a number up to the nearest integer, away from zero if negative

Name: CHR
Label: CHR
Description: Return a string with the first character's code point as the given number.

Name: CONTAINS
Label: CONTAINS
Description: Checks if text contains specified characters, and returns TRUE if it does.  Otherwise, returns FALSE

Name: COS
Label: COS
Description: Returns the cosine of the number, where the number given in radians

Name: CURRENCYRATE
Label: CURRENCYRATE
Description: Return the conversion rate to the corporate currency for the given CurrencyIsoCode, or 1.0 if the currency is invalid.

Name: DATE
Label: DATE
Description: Creates a date from a year, month and day

Name: DATETIMEVALUE
Label: DATETIMEVALUE
Description: Returns a year, month, day and GMT time value

Name: DATEVALUE
Label: DATEVALUE
Description: Creates a date from its datetime or text representation

Name: DAY
Label: DAY
Description: Returns the day of the month, a number between 1 and 31

Name: DAYOFYEAR
Label: DAYOFYEAR
Description: Return the day of the calendar year (from 1-366).

Name: DISTANCE
Label: DISTANCE
Description: Returns the distance between two locations using the provided unit.

Name: EXP
Label: EXP
Description: Returns e raised to the power of a given number

Name: FIND
Label: FIND
Description: Returns the position of the search_text string in text

Name: FLOOR
Label: FLOOR
Description: Rounds a number down, towards zero to the nearest integer

Name: FORMATDURATION
Label: FORMATDURATION
Description: Format the number of seconds with optional days, or the difference between times or dateTimes as HH:MI:SS.

Name: FROMUNIXTIME
Label: FROMUNIXTIME
Description: Return the datetime that represents the given number as the seconds elapsed since 1 Jan 1970.

Name: GEOLOCATION
Label: GEOLOCATION
Description: Returns a location based on the provided latitude and longitude.

Name: GETRECORDIDS
Label: GETRECORDIDS
Description: Returns an array of record IDs for the selected records in a list such as list view or related list. Use $ObjectType to identify the type of records such as $ObjectType.Contact.

Name: GETSESSIONID
Label: GETSESSIONID
Description: Returns the current session ID. This may be useful in hyperlinks to other applications that use salesforce.com credentials for authentication

Name: HOUR
Label: HOUR
Description: Returns hour of day

Name: HTMLENCODE
Label: HTMLENCODE
Description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in HTML

Name: HYPERLINK
Label: HYPERLINK
Description: Creates a hyperlink

Name: IF
Label: IF
Description: Checks whether a condition is true, and returns one value if TRUE and another value if FALSE.

Name: IMAGE
Label: IMAGE
Description: Inserts an image

Name: INCLUDE
Label: INCLUDE
Description: Includes the selected source content with optional inputs expressed as query parameters

Name: INCLUDES
Label: INCLUDES
Description: Determines if any value selected in a multi-select picklist field equals a text literal you specify.

Name: INITCAP
Label: INITCAP
Description: Return the text as lowercase with first character of each word made uppercase.

Name: ISBLANK
Label: ISBLANK
Description: Checks whether an expression is blank and returns TRUE or FALSE

Name: ISCHANGED
Label: ISCHANGED
Description: Checks if the field's value is different from its prior value, and returns TRUE if the values differ.  Otherwise, returns FALSE

Name: ISCLONE
Label: ISCLONE
Description: Checks if the record is a clone of another record, and returns TRUE if it is a clone.  Otherwise, returns FALSE

Name: ISNEW
Label: ISNEW
Description: Checks if the record is new, and returns TRUE if it is new.  Otherwise, returns FALSE

Name: ISNULL
Label: ISNULL
Description: Checks whether an expression is null and returns TRUE or FALSE

Name: ISNUMBER
Label: ISNUMBER
Description: Returns TRUE if the text value is a number. Otherwise, it returns FALSE.

Name: ISOWEEK
Label: ISOWEEK
Description: Return the ISO 8601 week number for the given date (from 1-53) so that the first week starts on monday.

Name: ISOYEAR
Label: ISOYEAR
Description: Return the ISO 8601 week-numbering 4-digit year for the given date so that the first day is a monday.

Name: ISPICKVAL
Label: ISPICKVAL
Description: Checks whether the value of a picklist field is equal to a string literal

Name: JSENCODE
Label: JSENCODE
Description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in JavaScript

Name: JSINHTMLENCODE
Label: JSINHTMLENCODE
Description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in JavaScript within HTML tags

Name: JUNCTIONIDLIST
Label: JUNCTIONIDLIST
Description: Returns a JunctionIDList based on the provided IDs. You can enter IDs only.

Name: LEFT
Label: LEFT
Description: Returns the specified number of characters from the start of a text string

Name: LEN
Label: LEN
Description: Returns the number of characters in a text string

Name: LINKTO
Label: LINKTO
Description: Returns the HTML link element for the selected target with optional inputs expressed as query parameters

Name: LN
Label: LN
Description: Returns the natural logarithm of a number

Name: LOG
Label: LOG
Description: Returns the base 10 logarithm of n

Name: LOWER
Label: LOWER
Description: Converts all letters in the value to lowercase

Name: LPAD
Label: LPAD
Description: Pad the left side of the value with spaces or the optional pad string so that the length is padded_length

Name: MAX
Label: MAX
Description: Returns the greatest of all the arguments

Name: MCEILING
Label: MCEILING
Description: Rounds a number up to the nearest integer, towards zero if negative

Name: MESSAGINGIMAGE
Label: MESSAGINGIMAGE
Description: Returns an image reference to a URL image to be rendered in a conversation message.

Name: MESSAGINGURLFOR
Label: MESSAGINGURLFOR
Description: Returns a public URL if available, for a record to be rendered in a conversation message template formula.

Name: MFLOOR
Label: MFLOOR
Description: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer, away from zero if negative

Name: MID
Label: MID
Description: Returns character from the middle of a text string, given a starting position and length

Name: MILLISECOND
Label: MILLISECOND
Description: Returns millisecond of day

Name: MIN
Label: MIN
Description: Returns the least of all the arguments

Name: MINUTE
Label: MINUTE
Description: Returns minute of day

Name: MOD
Label: MOD
Description: Returns the remainder after a number is divided by a divisor

Name: MONTH
Label: MONTH
Description: Returns the month, a number between 1 (January) and 12 (December)

Name: NOT
Label: NOT
Description: Changes FALSE to TRUE or TRUE to FALSE

Name: NOW
Label: NOW
Description: Returns a datetime representing the current moment

Name: NULLVALUE
Label: NULLVALUE
Description: Checks whether expression is null and returns substitute_expression if it is null. If expression is not null, returns the original expression value.

Name: OR
Label: OR
Description: Checks whether any of the arguments are true and returns TRUE or FALSE.  Returns FALSE only if all arguments are false

Name: PARENTGROUPVAL
Label: PARENTGROUPVAL
Description: Calculates the value of a summary field for a specified grouping level higher than the formula display level.

Name: PI
Label: PI
Description: Returns pi

Name: PICKLISTCOUNT
Label: PICKLISTCOUNT
Description: Returns the number of selected values in a multi-select picklist.

Name: PREVGROUPVAL
Label: PREVGROUPVAL
Description: Gets the value of a summary field from the previous grouping (1 increment back by default) at the specified grouping level. Returns null if no previous grouping.

Name: PRIORVALUE
Label: PRIORVALUE
Description: Returns the previous value for the field

Name: REGEX
Label: REGEX
Description: Returns TRUE if Text matches the regular expression RegEx_Text. Otherwise, it returns FALSE.

Name: REQUIRESCRIPT
Label: REQUIRESCRIPT
Description: Creates html script element that references the external script identified by url

Name: REVERSE
Label: REVERSE
Description: Returns the text string in reverse order

Name: RIGHT
Label: RIGHT
Description: Returns the specified number of characters from the end of a text string

Name: ROUND
Label: ROUND
Description: Rounds a number to a specified number of digits

Name: RPAD
Label: RPAD
Description: Pad the right side of the value with spaces or the optional pad string so that the length is padded_length

Name: SECOND
Label: SECOND
Description: Returns second of day

Name: SIN
Label: SIN
Description: Returns the sine of the number, where the number given in radians

Name: SQRT
Label: SQRT
Description: Returns the positive square root of a number

Name: SUBSTITUTE
Label: SUBSTITUTE
Description: Substitutes new_text for old_text in a text string. Use SUBSTITUTE when you want to replace specific text in a text string

Name: TAN
Label: TAN
Description: Returns the tangent of the number, where the number given in radians

Name: TEXT
Label: TEXT
Description: Converts a value to text using standard display format

Name: TIMENOW
Label: TIMENOW
Description: Returns a time representing the current moment

Name: TIMEVALUE
Label: TIMEVALUE
Description: Returns a time

Name: TODAY
Label: TODAY
Description: Returns the current date

Name: TRIM
Label: TRIM
Description: Removes all spaces from a text string except for single spaces between words

Name: TRUNC
Label: TRUNC
Description: Truncates a number to a specified number of digits

Name: UNIXTIMESTAMP
Label: UNIXTIMESTAMP
Description: Return the number of seconds since 1 Jan 1970 for the given date, or number of seconds in the day for a time.

Name: UPPER
Label: UPPER
Description: Converts all letters in the value to uppercase

Name: URLENCODE
Label: URLENCODE
Description: Encodes text and merge field values for use in URLs

Name: URLFOR
Label: URLFOR
Description: Returns the url for the selected target with optional inputs expressed as query parameters

Name: VALUE
Label: VALUE
Description: Converts a text string that represents a number to a number

Name: VLOOKUP
Label: VLOOKUP
Description: Searches an object for a record where the specified field matches the specified lookup_value. If a match is found, returns another specified field value.

Name: WEEKDAY
Label: WEEKDAY
Description: Return the day of the week for the given date, using 1 for Sunday, 2 for Monday, through 7 for Saturday.

Name: YEAR
Label: YEAR
Description: Returns the year of a date, a number between 1900 and 9999
